text: Joe Chahoud is a multi-disciplinary artist from Lebanon. He works as a visual artist, harpist, singer,https://www.youtube.com/watch?si=r5lF0svel5SVIlp5&v;=g7VyQxBtr5c&feature;=youtu.be performer, and a circus artist. His performances include Christmas festivities and church recitals https://beirutchants.com/wp- content/uploads/2024/12/BCF_2024_Brochure-digital.pdf as well as cabaret shows and electronic concerts. As a harpist, he performed at intimate salon concerts,https://www.lorientlejour.com/article/1409647/la-voix-de-matteo-el- khodr-pour-calmer-les-esprits.html corporate events, trade shows, and private gatherings. Joe is the first and only male Lebanese harpist.http://harpomania.free.fr/HARPESMAG47.pdf ==Repertoire== His music spans from baroque melodies, to classic French tunes, Arabic classics to pop favorites.https://www.agendaculturel.com/events/a-musical-experience-with- matteo-and-joe-in-concerthttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aCMUMSJqRws ==Online Presence== Joe Chahoud maintains an active online presence, sharing his performances and artworks on platforms like YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCI6Ei3m0iCcBD8JG4JGX3BQ/videos and Instagram.https://www.instagram.com/joechahoud/ == References == Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2024 Category:Lebanese musicians
title: Joe Chahoud
